text:
CHANNEL
STUDIOS—UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON
TRANSMITTER—EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
KCTS-TV
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
Feb. 11, 1961
Dear Bills
I've been out of town a couple of days & came by the
office today (Saturday) and found your wire about
appearing before Maggie1s committee.
While neither date is entirely convenient, the 2nd is
the more so. I have made reservations to fly to
Washington on the First, can appear on the Second, and
will return here on the third. 1*11 make hotel reser¬
vations when I am there next week.
You*11 probably get this letter as fast as a wire, so
thought I would write, instead.
On my trip next week I'm coming in on Tuesday, will be
at the Dupont Plaia Tuesday night. Id like to spend
some time with you Wed. — also go over to the hill to
see Magnuson and Carl Downing. I'll call you during
the early part of Wed. morning. If you'd like to go
with me to see both Carl and Magnuson, I'd be happy to
have you do so. If you are tied up, leave word at the
hotel when you'll be free and I'll wander over to the
hill and catch you later.
Loren
University of Washington Seattle Public Schools <s King County Schools Seattle University Seattle Pacific College Seattle Public Library
